meanings.definition: excessively serious or solemn in manner or attitude
meanings.sent1: She always looks overserious during important meetings.
meanings.sent2: He is overserious about following the rules.
meanings.sent3: The overserious expression on his face made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her overserious demeanor turned the room into a somber place.
meanings.sent5: The overserious tone in his voice made it hard to tell if he was joking.

meanings.definition: taking things too seriously or lacking a sense of humor
meanings.sent1: The overserious student couldn't enjoy the funny movie.
meanings.sent2: She is overserious about every little mistake.
meanings.sent3: His overserious reaction to the prank was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The overserious atmosphere at work made it hard to relax.
meanings.sent5: Their overseriousness about the project made it seem like life or death.
